column4: Phoenix[SPH]  - I get mine done via direct debit (electronic) byt a few people I know still get checks.
A guy I work with, he still gets his via check.
If I get a bonus, it always comes via check, not direct debit.
I get pay stubs.
Phoenix[SPH]  To buy out right, about $150,00 to $200,00. Most people mortage.
(shoul be an extra zero on each of those prices)
I think you're missing a zero.  ;)
whaaat?
Phoenix[SPH] , It depends where you are, of course.  I'm in Ottawa, and I bought a house in the summer for $210000
I pay $600/mth for my flat (apartment)
yep
how many sqr ft?
1200, not including the basement
My cousin is an hour west (Renfrew) and theirs was $90000
Um... lots?
About the name In my town, you could prolly get a house almost twice the size as jeramys for the same price.
3 bedrooms, 2.5 bathrooms, living room, eating area, family room, kitchen, laundry room
Yeah, well Fort Frances is in the middle of nowhere.  ;)
We're about 50/50 on the metric system
I'm quite happy to buy a 2300sqr/ft house for the same price as you paid for yours and live in a small town. :D
